title: Weird flashing text line everywere
content: I was watching YouTube today and i realized a flashing white line in the bottom left of my screen. then i went to a few different website and i saw the same thing, although the position was different. I realized that the position of the line depended on where you clicked and only on lines of text. i haven't downloaded any add on in a wile and i have only just saw this today.
